Class MyShelfieApplication

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.app.MyShelfieApplication
public class MyShelfieApplication extends javafx.application.Application
Class that lets you chose if you want to open Server or Client.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException, InterruptedException, NotBoundException
      Static method to run Server or ClientBase.
      Parameters:
      args - the arguments that you insert on the opening jar (args[0] contains the choice to start Server or Client).
      Throws:
      IOException - in case of problem with input/output.
      InterruptedException - in case of problem with thread interruption.
      NotBoundException - in cas of attempt to search or disassociate in the registry a name that does not have an associated link.

    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage stage) throws IOException
      The main entry point for all JavaFX applications.
      Specified by:
      start in class javafx.application.Application
      Parameters:
      stage - the stage for this application, onto which the application scene can be set.
      Throws:
      IOException - in case of problems with input/output.
